Cara Armand Maulana Jaga Kualitas Suara
03 Nov 2019, 00:04 by Siska Nirmala
Armand Maulana harus menjaga kualitas suara menyusul posisinya sebagai vokalis grup musik GIGI, salah satunya adalah dengan memperbanyak waktu tidur dan berolahraga.
Seperti dilansir Kantor Berita Antara, Armand dalam peluncuran perangkat memorabilia eksklusif di Jakarta, Sabtu, 2 November 2019, mengatakan ada dua personel yang wajib menjaga kondisi fisik dalam sebuah grup musik. Mereka adalah vokalis dan pemain drum. Sebab, kedua posisi tersebut membutuhkan stamina yang kuat.
"Vokalis dan drummer kalau staminanya turun langsung kelihatan. Kalau gitaris dan pemain bas kan tangannya jangan sampai cedera. Rahasianya, saya ya harus jaga kesehatan dan kebetulan saya dilahirkan sebagai orang yang suka olahraga dan tidak merokok," ujar Armand.
Suami Dewi Gita itu mengaku waktu tidur yang kurang akan mempengaruhi kualitas suaranya seperti serak dan sumbang. Tapi, kondisi tersebut dapat diperbaiki dengan istirahat.
"Kalau kurang istirahat, suara saya jadi fals, hilang konsentrasi, lupa-lupa lirik. Kalau kayak gitu, obatnya ya cuma istirahat. Saya juga belum pernah minum alkohol. Makanya, saya masih energik. Kan makan juga benar-benar dipola," ujar pelantun lagu "11 Januari" itu.
Armand juga bersyukur karena tidak pernah mengalami cedera pita suara seperti rekan-rekannya sesama vokalis.
"Kalau pita suara rusak kayak Once, Judika, Lasso (Ari Lasso) sih enggak pernah. Tapi kalau suara fals, ya pernah. Kalau udah parah, baru ke dokter. Tapi saya punya triknya, ya harus tidur itu," kata Armand.***

How to Armand Maulana Maintain Sound Quality
Nov 3, 2019, 00:04 by Siska Nirmala
Armand Maulana must maintain the sound quality following his position as vocalist of the band GIGI, one of which is to increase sleep time and exercise.
As reported by Antara News Agency, Armand in the launch of an exclusive memorabilia device in Jakarta, Saturday, November 2, 2019, said there were two personnel who were required to maintain physical condition in a music group. They are vocalists and drummers. Because, both of these positions require strong stamina.
"Vocalist and drummer if the stamina goes down immediately visible. If the guitarist and bassist do not get his hands injured. The secret is, I must take care of my health and incidentally I was born as someone who likes sports and not smoking," Armand said.
Dewi Gita's husband claimed that lack of sleep would affect the quality of his voice such as hoarseness and discord. But, the condition can be improved by resting.
"If I don't get enough rest, my voice becomes falsified, I lose my concentration, I forget the lyrics. If it's like that, the medicine is just resting. I've also never drunk alcohol. So, I'm still energetic. I also eat really patterned," said the singer of the song "January 11".
Armand is also grateful for having never suffered a vocal cord injury like his fellow vocalists.
"If the vocal cords are broken like Once, Judika, Lasso (Ari Lasso), it's never been. But if the sound is falsified, yes ever. If it's already bad, then just see a doctor. But I have the trick, then I have to sleep," Armand said. * **
